column5: I was driving this morn thru the valley and seen a vehicle comin at me with an empty black trailer behind---definetely gave it the once over---different fenders--will keep lookin  Bushart

buggers...at the risk of sounding racist, one word RESERVATION  Local law enforcement have told me that 99% of them end up there along with all your new pickups.  Friend took a photo over the Brantford reserve last year and it was littered with trucks in various stages of disassembley. Sorry for the loss , hope you had insurance up to date
Sorry to hear Terry. I forwarded the pics to 26 dealers around ontario in hopes that someone will see it.
sorry to hear about your lost ill keep my ears and eyes open  hope u had good insurance
sorry to hear about this terry...i will print some pics and keep an eye out on the mainland and islands...
This sucks Terry.  Sorry to hear that.  Jim
Brian, would you like a tag team partner?  G
And hopefully prints off the trailer...... if this person has a prior conviction should be easy to ascertain who did this... That said.. it is unlikely the police would resort to this measure...  G
How many km and hours? and guys keep an eye out for it being advertised as a 2007.
Sorry to hear about this Terry.  I hope things work out for ya
Sorry to hear this Terry, I'll keep an eye open in the Lindsay area and will deliver flyers to the local shops tomorrow.
Lets not get carried away now misfish.  Ill keep my eyes open (if that makes you feel any better).  ATV is long gone, hope you had insurance.
You've got my eyes - I'll be keeping a hopeful lookout.
Sorry to here about your ATV and trailer Terry. Will keep my eyes peeled in the London area for ya.....

Well Terry if we see it on our travels I will be shure to let the other guys I run with make a good road block and have a little fun for ya with them pukes. Heck its been a long time since we had any fun on the road and with the other three I run with I am shure we can cover the HWy.  Sorry to here of the news Terry
Likewise Terry, I'll let the local Yamaha dealer in Shelburne know about the theft. If they plan to unload it, we can at least make things difficult for them!
Son's o' bees ripped my friend off just the same, during the day when he was at work. Never recovered either. All I can hope is that their Karma returns tenfold!

I feel for ya Terry. I am with G I will keep my eyes peeled in the Creek area. I will send out an email at work tomorrow, I have a lot of guys who live in the boons around the GTA to keep their eyes open as well.
thanks everyone

Good chance the Police will nab them...  Not a crime of opportunity, or random. They scoped it out, and planned their day... Its more then likely a local who frequents your area, and saw somthing he liked. He'll probobly not be selling it any time soon.... But if he does the chance of the Cops getting is even better! They will no doubt be all over the local classifieds, and I'd hope the dealers will not take it with out the paperwork. Not much different then taking a car....  They'll get whats comming to them. I just hope for your sake its sooner then later.  I'll keep my eyes on the classifieds for ya. I'm actually looking at ATV"S right now any way.

Terry...what a bummer!  I drive from the Oshawa area to Toronto every weekday and I'll be sure to look for a trailer with an ATV....even have the camera phone ready to take a pic if it looks even close.

That's a hell of a thing, ain't it.  Ya can't turn yer back fer a minute without some wrong wordloser lookin' to take yer stuff.  Well, that's the beauty of this here site, it might help nab the sonnabeatch.

that sure sucks!!! i will keep my eyes open for it as well.  just a heads up you may want to look at kijiji, there are a ton of hot items on that site from what i hear form a few cops in my area.  Cheers!
Terry... did you evict anyone this month or last?
no I can't think of anyone who would want to do this to me
Damn some people can be so stupid. Sorry about your ATV being stolen hope you find it the way it was when it was taken and that they find the idiot who stole it.
I heard about this theft on Rock 95 yesterday, but had No idea it was you Terry... Really sorry to hear this.  Hopefully with the radio reports and the OFC community, it gets recovered...
Sorry to hear some one took your atv Terry hope you find it and who took it  Rob

Terry, sorry to hear bud. That's an awesome machine and will certainly catch my attention if it goes by. If karma has anything to do with this we'll read about this guy going out on Simcoe and getting stranded on an ice float. Good luck Terry! -Brian

Hey Terry, sent an email to about 60 people today trying to cover as much area as possible for you. Went from Timmins to Ottawa, Niagara to Sarnia. Tried to cover as much of the Province as I could. Dont know anyone in Quebec right now so I cant help you there. I will forward to my guys in the states as well.
....Brutal!

DAM !!!!!...Terry i know what you are going through as i just had my car stolen 2 weeks ago.  ...i hope the cops can find it ,and you know we are all looking for it as well,i have a camera phone as well,they better not try and drive near me with an atv, around me,as i will cross traffic to take a look as well !!!! hope the S.O.B"s get what they deserve,they might try to sell it,so watch all the ads,and check with dealers.....man im ticked off,

sunday night, between 10pm and 2pm someone took my trailer and atv here are some pictures if you hear or see someone trying to sell one that looks like sounds like mine please pm me or call the cops thanks
Now that sucks Terry!   I'll keep my eyes open for yah... I bet I know who's gonna want to strangle who ever did it! HH
Terry..... I hope the sot rots in hell.... I will keep an eye out.  G
AWW MAN say it isn't so !  Serial/model number etc Terry and I'll drop copies/pics off at the local shops.  Oh.. and please tell me it was insured for theft...
2006 yamaha grizzly 660 blue s/n jy4m03w36c042600
If the person plans on keeping the trailer.... It should NOT be hard to miss.... do you have any more pictures of the trailer Terry?  G

Okay Terry.. printed 5 copies of picture and model/serial # and off to the local dealers/repair guys for their bulletin boards.  Doubtful it will be helpful... but better than another kick in the nuts for yah.
Hmmmmmmm I hate to read this Terry. Sorry there such idiots out there. Will let you know if I see it, as I know your ATV well. Hope you recover it quickly.  Cheers, Ice Fisherman
Some people!!!  Sorry for you luck Terry,  I will keep an eye open but bet its boxed and sold by now
That really sucks Terry.  I cant figure out how some people sleep at night.
Sorry to hear that Terry....  That really sucks.  I'll keep my eyes open but it's doubtful I'll see anything around Oakville...  Hopefully you had some good insurance.

Sorry about the loss and hopefully it'll be recovered soon.  I remember seeing a spot on "A" Channel new not long ago about a theft ring that was stealing trailers, ATV, cars and the sorts and dumping off on an abandoned lot until they sold 'em out of Barrie.   If anyone is driving by such a lot, haver a peek and see if Terry's articles are there.  If you're approached, tell 'em you thought it was a sales lot and the perps might even try selling Terry's stuff.  Call the Police before Terry gets to them.  I know I'd be rabid.
on a chance what are the plate #'s on the atv and trailer, keep my eyes open for ya
Watch kijiji....all sorts of dishonest people on there 'cause it isn't regulated like ebay...

I had one stolen as well Terry. Had just completed an overhaul on it and ready for the trail. Some dude stole it before I had a chance to use it. I will keep an eye out for it in case it ends up up here. God I hope they catch him.
That's just plain lousy Terry, sure hope it all works out for ya.  Makes you sick doesn't it, when you can't leave anything around without some punk helping themselves to it ??
Sorry to hear that Terry, that really sucks. I will put the word out in my area down here.
That really bites Terry.  You certainly use it all the time and it will suck if you don't recover it.  I will keep my eyes peeled at all times for it.  Joey

Sorry it had to happen to you Terry. I only see one listed today on Kijiji. It's in Bracebridge:  THIS ATV IS IN EXCELLENT CONDITION AND DOES EXIST!! NOT LIKE ALOT OF ADS ON THIS SITE. THE ATV HAS A ULTRAMATIC TRANSMISSION, A DIGITAL INSTRUMENT PANEL, PUSH BUTTON ON COMMAND 2WD, 4WD AND 4WD DIFF LOCK. IT ALSO COMES WITH A 2500 LBS WARN WINCH AND SKID PLATES. THE ATV ONLY HAS 721 MILES ON IT. FOR MORE INFO OR SHOWING CALL ERIC AT 705-646-4276  They painted it quickly.  Good luck

I got Quinte area covered for ya Terry. There are tons of ATV's and the like (used), always for sale out here. Like Wayne, Ive printed off a few cpies to distribute. Its no problem at all...everything is very close to me. dude's.........Wish you luck man. bNb

sorry to hear Terry  also took a look at the local kijijji site  only one there is listed as an '05 but has a different rack on the back and no fairing  listed at an absolutely ridiculous price, total scam  http://sudbury.kijiji.ca/c-cars-vehicles-A...QQAdIdZ43870825

You know what members..... We could be faster then the coppers on this. Look how far spread we are plus we are all always on the lookout for exellent deals.. If its not gone south or to europe I bet we have enough members to cover every part of Onatrio. Can a 'Observation' type thing be put in place at the Ont/Que border? Anyone know?..........Manitoba as well?

A good idea Pete.. but if it went to Quebec it was probably already there before sunrise. I figure someone's eyeballed Terry's place for awhile and checked it out a few times to see what was locked and how to leave with it. It's local and stripped.... or hidden away destine for a back country camp. The only thing that may turn up is the trailer abandoned.
Terry, if you havent found it by the time i go to press ill put a page in for you....  well scour the earth for your stuff!!
